verbs.description: [V: can] i use my phone just on wifi without a carrier this question just popped up in our galaxy note 4 forums but it one that we 've seen related to other phones before as well intro we 're all so used to buying a phone with intentions of using it on a carrier that we often do n't consider what it will operate like without a sim in it http forums androidcentral com samsung - galaxy - note-4 492583-can - i - use - wifi - without - carrier html rest assured that your phone will operate just fine without active service from a carrier leaving it as a wifi - only device google maps sd card glonass lg wifi youtube the house gps units android vonage mobile
